entries.title: Original Intelligence (OI)
entries.summary: Non-narrative, non-effortful intelligence revealed as interference settles.

entries.title: Zero Field
entries.summary: The field of pure potentiality before manifestation; the ground of being.

entries.title: Field Coherence
entries.summary: A state where the internal and external fields resonate in harmony.

entries.title: Automatic Self
entries.summary: The conditioned, reactive self that operates on patterns and habits.

entries.title: Conscious Self
entries.summary: The aware presence witnessing the automatic self without judgment.

entries.title: Arrival (Phase 0)
entries.summary: The initial phase of the protocol: landing in the present moment.

entries.title: Turning Inward (Phase 1)
entries.summary: Directing attention from external objects to internal sensation.

entries.title: Deceleration (Phase 2)
entries.summary: Slowing down the frequency of thought and nervous system activity.

entries.title: Expansion (Phase 3)
entries.summary: The natural widening of awareness as contraction releases.

entries.title: Stillness (Phase 4)
entries.summary: The cessation of movement where Original Intelligence becomes clear.
